main.name: Amrutha Adiyath
main.description: A passionate and empathetic programmer with {{EXPERIENCE}} years of extensive technical expertise. I take immense pride in the quality of my code. My experience spans across front-end and back-end development, as well as database design and development.
main.bio:
Greetings! I am Amrutha Adiyath, currently residing in the vibrant city of Moose Jaw, Canada. I have amassed {{EXPERIENCE}} years of comprehensive experience in programming, mastering both front-end and backend technologies such as ReactJS, Java, Python, and PostgreSQL. 

 As an artist by hobby, I have a particular fondness for front-end development, where I can blend my technical skills with my creative flair. My love for animals has led me to rescue and foster cats, and I take pride in my ability to handle even the most challenging felines. In my downtime, you will find me experimenting in the kitchen, engrossed in a thrilling movie, or unwinding to the tunes of rock music!
main.contactmessage: If you have something interesting to discuss, I'd love to hear from you. Please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: The following are my current skills and expertise

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Technology Management
education.description: During this program, I developed expertise in Java and Python for project development and software architecture, utilizing SQL Server for backend databases. In the first semester, I acquired a comprehensive understanding of network management principles and protocols. Additionally, I enhanced my business communication skills, including conflict resolution and negotiation abilities. Moving into the second semester, I learned data visualization techniques using PowerBI and Python. I also gained practical experience in Agile-based project management, along with knowledge of business strategies like ITIL, IT ethics, and data privacy laws.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
education.description: During my academic journey, I delved deep into the intricacies of data structures and algorithms. My self-motivated learning approach led me to explore modern technologies such as HTML and JavaScript. This newfound knowledge sparked my interest in web development, prompting me to create a variety of websites. These projects, ranging from course-related to personal endeavors and my own personal website, served as practical applications of my theoretical understanding.

work.title: Store Associate
work.description: As a customer service specialist, I assist customers in finding the right products for their needs, answering their questions, and providing them with relevant information. I strive to build lasting relationships with customers and enhance their experience. I also handle phone and online orders, ensuring they are processed and fulfilled efficiently. Additionally, I manage inbound calls and resolve customer issues in the first interaction.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: I started my career as a front-end developer, focusing on ReactJS. Over time, I transitioned to backend development, using Java, Python, and NodeJS alongside PostgreSQL. Throughout my extensive tenure at QBurst, I've crafted numerous applications. These range from a front-end solution for a prominent retail corporation to backend order management systems, batch applications within microservices architectures, API applications, and database design and optimization projects.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Learned about various front-end development technologies, Learned to convert wire-frames to web pages

projects.title: theOathWriter.com
projects.category: (offline now) Portfolio website for a friend

Volunteer.name: SCRAPS Moose Jaw
Volunteer.description: I've contributed to the socialization of kittens, preparing them for their future homes, while also offering assistance in various tasks and responsibilities as needed.

Volunteer.name: PAWS Thrissur
Volunteer.description: I've been deeply involved in rescuing, fostering, and preparing cats for adoption, providing essential care such as administering medications and grooming across all age groups and health conditions. Additionally, I've conducted thorough interviews to ensure the best matches between adoptable animals and potential owners. Furthermore, I've taken charge of content creation and promotion efforts to increase adoption rates.
